DOC.brief_summary: The goal clinical research study see ovarian cancer patient add Juice PLus+ Juice Plus+ Complete diet good outcome compare ovarian cancer patient receive dietary counseling alone .
DOC.brief_title: Juice Plus+ Juice Plus+ Complete Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Before start study , patient dietary pattern evaluation , physical exam , blood test , height , weight , hip , wrist , mid-arm waist circumference measurement . Researchers compare change weight , waist , hip , mid-arm wrist size , change amount vitamin , iron , nutrient blood . Researchers also measure level proteins link ovarian tumor . Patients randomly pick ( toss coin ) one two group . One group receive free charge nutritional counsel 6 month , second group receive free charge daily supplement . These supplement make combination fruit vegetable ( Juice Plus+ ) . Patients ask take two capsule ( Juice Plus+ ) morning , two capsule ( Juice Plus+ ) along drink contain vitamin mineral ( Juice Plus+ Complete ) even 6 month . All patient eat pattern monitor six month . Patients come clinic least every three month part normal treatment schedule . Each visit take 3 hour include physical exam , blood test , anthropometric measurement ( height , weight , waist , hip , mid-arm , wrist circumference ) . At visit , dietary quality life assessment also do . With exception first interview , nutritional counseling mostly do 30 60 minute telephone call week two month . Counseling also do every week two month month two month . Participation study stop patient start feed vein , patient get pregnant begin breast feeding , patient bowel obstruction , patient diagnose condition require restrict diet , patient begin medication incompatible high fiber diet , patient severe side effect . This investigational study . A total 50 patient take part study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 19.5 2 . Epithelial ovarian cancer ( tumor type ) . Stages 2 . 3 . In first clinical remission . ( CA125 < 35 ) 4 . > 21 year age . 5 . CT scan abdomen/pelvis without evidence ovarian cancer . 6 . Ambulatory/mobile able eat/not parenteral nutrition . 7 . Life expectancy least 6 month . 8 . Informed consent sign indicate patient 's knowledge investigational nature study . 1 . Evidence bowel obstruction . 2 . Pregnant lactating . 3 . Diagnosed comorbidity require restrict diet medication high fiber diet may contraindicate .
